main event: A civilian pilot in Houston, Texas observed an intense white light approximately 1000 feet above him for a total duration of 28 minutes. The object moved rapidly and disappeared towards the Ft Worth-Waco area. No sound or markings were noted, and there were no radar reports of the object.
interesting points: The observation lasted for less than 28 minutes and involved a single intense white light object at a high altitude.
The object exhibited rapid and evasive maneuvering, veering in response to the pilot's movements before disappearing at high speed.
No sound or markings were detected on the object, and there were no radar reports about the sighting.
The object's speed was estimated to be 4-5 times the true airspeed of the pilot's aircraft.
The object's disappearance towards the Ft Worth-Waco area adds geographical context to the sighting.
sighted object: intense white light approximately 1000 feet above the pilot
